channel.title: Mediagazer
channel.description: Top news and commentary for media professionals from all around the web

item.title: TikTok、クリエイターがAI生成コンテンツにラベルを付けるツールを発表、そのようなコンテンツに自動的にラベルを付ける他の方法をテストする計画も（Sarah Perez/TechCrunch）
item.description:
Sarah Perez / TechCrunch:
TikTok launches a tool to let creators label their AI-generated content and plans to test other ways of labeling such content automatically  —  As more creators turn to AI for their artistic expression, there's also a broader push for transparency around when AI was involved in content creation.

item.title: SAG-AFTRAのストライキは、バービーやミッション.インポッシブルなどが撮影された英国にどのような影響を与えているか？バービー』、『ミッション：インポッシブル』、『インディ・ジョーンズ』などが撮影されたイギリスでは、多くの人々が仕事を失っている。
item.description:
Eshe Nelson / New York Times:
How the SAG-AFTRA strikes are impacting the UK, where Barbie, Mission: Impossible, Indiana Jones, and more were filmed, as many now find themselves out of work  —  Many U.S. studios' blockbusters are filmed in Britain, so the walkouts by actors and screenwriters have caused thousands of U.K. film crews to lose work.

item.title: YouTube、ラッセル・ブランドのレイプ・性的暴行疑惑を受け、「プラットフォーム外での行動」を理由に、ユーザーを「保護」するためにラッセル・ブランドの動画への広告掲載を一時停止（Naman Ramachandran/Variety）
item.description:
Naman Ramachandran / Variety:
YouTube suspends ads on Russell Brand's videos to “protect” users, citing his “off-platform behavior”, after allegations of rape and sexual assault  —  Google-owned YouTube has suspended advertisements on videos by comedian and actor Russell Brand after allegations of rape and sexual assault.

item.title: TikTokを禁止しようとするモンタナ州の取り組みを18州の司法長官が支持し、2024年1月1日の発効に先立ち、法的異議を却下するよう米判事に要請（David Shepardson/Reuters）
item.description:
David Shepardson / Reuters:
A group of 18 state AGs backs Montana's effort to ban TikTok, urging a US judge to reject legal challenges ahead of the January 1, 2024, effective date  —  A group of 18 state attorneys general said on Monday they backed Montana's effort to ban Chinese-owned short video app TikTok …

item.title: インディペンデント紙のクリスチャン・ブロートンCEOへのインタビュー：eコマース、インディペンデントTV、読者収入、米国での事業拡大、AI（Charlotte Tobitt/Press Gazette）。
item.description:
Charlotte Tobitt / Press Gazette:
An interview with The Independent CEO Christian Broughton on the newspaper's growth drivers: e-commerce, Independent TV, reader revenues, US expansion, and AI  —  The Independent is ready for a period of “global growth”, led by a team who all have journalism in their DNA, according to its new chief executive Christian Broughton.

item.title: ドナルド・トランプとイーロン・マスクに攻撃されたツイッターの元信頼・安全責任者、その結果起きた悪用、ファクトチェック、ツイッター・ファイルなどについて振り返る（Yoel Roth/New York Times）。
item.description:
Yoel Roth / New York Times:
Twitter's former head of trust and safety reflects on Donald Trump and Elon Musk attacking him, the resulting abuse, fact-checking, the Twitter Files, and more  —  When I worked at Twitter, I led the team that placed a fact-checking label on one of Donald Trump's tweets for the first time.

item.title: ディズニーによると、『エレメンタル』は興行収入4億8400万ドル以上を記録した後、最初の5日間で2640万ビューを集め、2023年にDisney+で最も視聴されたプレミア映画となった（Matt Grobar/Deadline）
item.description:
Matt Grobar / Deadline:
Disney says Elemental is the most watched movie premiere on Disney+ in 2023, drawing 26.4M views in its first five days, after earning $484M+ at the box office  —  Disney and Pixar announced on Monday that their animated feature Elemental, starring Leah Lewis and Mamoudou Athie …

item.title: デラウェア州判事は、ドミニオン社がニューズマックス社に対して起こした、2020年選挙の嘘の放送をめぐる16億ドルの名誉毀損訴訟について、2024年9月に裁判を行うことを決定した（Marshall Cohen/CNN）
item.description:
Marshall Cohen / CNN:
A Delaware judge rules that Dominion's $1.6B defamation suit against Newsmax over the network's airing of 2020 election lies will go to trial in September 2024  —  Dominion Voting Systems' $1.6 billion defamation lawsuit against Newsmax over the right-wing network's airing of 2020 election lies …

item.title: WGAとAMPTPは9月20日に協議を再開する予定で、ストリーミングサービスが利益をため込むなど、合意を妨げる最大の神話を見てみよう（Lucas Shaw/Bloomberg）
item.description:
Lucas Shaw / Bloomberg:
With the WGA and the AMPTP set to resume talks on September 20, a look at the biggest myths impeding a deal, including that streaming services hoard the profits  —  The writers and studios are going back to the table after a month of not speaking.  —  Mark your calendars sports fans.

item.title: 9月18日、ニューヨーク・タイムズのスポーツ・スタッフとギルドのメンバー数十人が、独立したスポーツ・デスクの廃止に抗議するため、同紙のオフィスをデモ行進した（Ben Strauss/Washington Post）
item.description:
Ben Strauss / Washington Post:
Dozens of New York Times sports staff and Guild members marched through the newspaper's offices on September 18 to protest the end of its standalone sports desk  —  Dozens of New York Times sports staffers and Guild members marched through the Times offices Monday afternoon to protest the end of the Times's stand-alone sports desk.

item.title: プーチン大統領、ノーベル平和賞受賞のロシア人ジャーナリスト、ドミトリー・ムラトフ氏が管理する出版資産を「一時的な国家管理」に移す法令に署名（ロイター）
item.description:
Reuters:
Putin signs a decree transferring publishing assets controlled by Nobel Peace Prize-winning Russian journalist Dmitry Muratov to “temporary state management”  —  Russian President Vladimir Putin has transferred publishing assets controlled by Nobel Prize-winning Russian journalist Dmitry Muratov …

item.title: WGAとAMPTPが契約交渉の再開に合意したため、ビル・メーアが週刊深夜番組『Real Time』の制作再開を「今のところ」延期（Rick Porter/The Hollywood Reporter）
item.description:
Rick Porter / The Hollywood Reporter:
Bill Maher delays resuming the production of his weekly late-night show Real Time “for now” as the WGA and the AMPTP agree to resume contract negotiations  —  The comedian says he'll delay the HBO show's return “for now” as negotiations between striking writers and media companies are set to begin again.

item.title: ABCは今季、マンデーナイトフットボールの試合を従来の予想より10試合追加放送し、ESPNとサイマル放送する。
item.description:
Brian Steinberg / Variety:
ABC will air 10 additional Monday Night Football games than previously expected this season, simulcasting them with ESPN, to boost its strike-hampered schedule  —  “Monday Night Football” was for many years a staple of ABC's Monday-night line-up before it moved to ESPN in 2006.  This fall, it will be so again.

item.title: RIAA：2023年上半期の米国レコード音楽収入は前年同期比9.3％増の84億ドルと過去最高を記録、主な牽引役はストリーミングで10.3％増の70億ドル、有料ストリーミングは11％増の55億ドル（Dan Rys/Billboard）
item.description:
Dan Rys / Billboard:
RIAA: US recorded music revenues grew 9.3% YoY in H1 2023 to a record $8.4B; streaming was the primary driver, up 10.3% to $7B; paid streaming grew 11% to $5.5B  —  Recorded-music revenues in the United States grew 9.3% in the first half of 2023, reaching an all-time mid-year high of $8.4 billion …

item.title: タイム社は、世界のオピニオンリーダーを特集する編集プラットフォーム「Time100 Voices」と週刊ニュースレター「Time POV」を立ち上げ、オピニオンコンテンツを倍増させた（Sara Fischer/Axios）
item.description:
Sara Fischer / Axios:
Time doubles down on opinion content by launching Time100 Voices, an editorial platform featuring global thought leaders, and Time POV, a weekly newsletter  —  Time on Monday announced a new editorial platform called Time100 Voices that is dedicated to elevating perspectives from global thought leaders.
